30040000.Original_Text: 이번에도 늦으셨습니다~ <textColor=[78:148:215:255]>문주님</>! 하하.\n간만에 돌아오신 걸 환영합니다!
30040000.English_Text:
You're late, <textColor=[78:148:215:255]>Master</>! Haha.
Long time no see!
30040000.Chinese_Text:
这次也迟到了呢~门主大人！哈哈。
欢迎时隔已久的回归！

30040002.Chinese_Text: （听说是因为继承了始路大人的气息！）

30040004.English_Text:
The <textColor=[78:148:215:255]>Scout Captain</> is handling the business with the <textColor=[215:94:94:255]>Hoglins</>.
Please go to talk to the <textColor=[78:148:215:255]>Scout Captain</>.
30040004.Chinese_Text:
血猪族的事情由巡逻组长负责解决。
请去找巡逻组长。

30040005.Original_Text: <textColor=[78:148:215:255]>홍돈칠</>만 믿고 있어도 괜찮을까?\n하, 그래도 지금은 그 방법 밖에...
30040005.English_Text:
Is it okay to trust <textColor=[78:148:215:255]>Hogdon</>?
Well, that's the only thing we can do for now...
30040005.Chinese_Text:
只靠血猪七真的没问题吗？
唉，可是现在也只有这一个办法...

30040006.English_Text:
Accepting help from the <textColor=[215:94:94:255]>Hoglins</>!
What are the <textColor=[78:148:215:255]>elder</> and <textColor=[78:148:215:255]>leader</> thinking?
30040006.Chinese_Text:
竟然决定接受血猪族的帮助！
长老与组长到底在想什么？

30040007.Original_Text: 그래도 다 계획이 있으시겠지.\n우리는 두 분을 믿고 따르는 수 밖에.
30040007.English_Text:
I guess they have a plan.
We have no choice but to trust and follow them.
30040007.Chinese_Text:
我想两位应该有自己的考量。
我们只能相信并遵从他们的决定。

30040008.English_Text:
What will happen to our tribe?
I miss the <textColor=[110:216:175:255]>Moonwater Plains</>...
30040008.Chinese_Text:
我们部族的命运将何去何从...
我很怀念水月平原...

30040009.Original_Text: 잘 부탁하셔~!\n우리 부족의 운명은 둘의 손에 달렸으셔!
30040009.English_Text:
Good luck!
The fate of our tribe is all up to you two!
30040009.Chinese_Text:
拜托了~！
我们部族的命运掌握在两位的手中！

30040011.English_Text:
<textColor=[78:148:215:255]>Hoguno</> already filled me in.
Impressive work!
30040011.Chinese_Text:
我已经听红敦说了。
辛苦了！

30040012.English_Text:
The <textColor=[215:94:94:255]>Daybreak</> is putting up a tougher resistance than I expected.
I think it's time to consider reinforcements.
30040012.Chinese_Text:
黑暗黎明团的抵抗超出预期。
是否应该请求增员？

30040013.Original_Text: <textColor=[78:148:215:255]>문주님</>과 동행하는 저 소협은 누구지?\n뭔가 묘한 기운이 느껴지는데.
30040013.English_Text:
Who is that person with the <textColor=[78:148:215:255]>master</>?
I feel a strange energy coming from them.
30040013.Chinese_Text:
与门主同行的那少侠是谁？
感觉有些奇妙。

30040014.Original_Text: 깜짝놀랄만한 증원이라는게 대체 뭐지?\n어!? 저, 저분은??
30040014.English_Text:
Who's this astonishingly strong person who came to help us?
Huh?! Is that...?
30040014.Chinese_Text:
令人吃惊的增员到底是什么？
咦？！那，那位是？？

30040015.English_Text:
Urgh... I messed up.
Are you okay?
30040015.Chinese_Text:
唔...真是失策。
喂，你没事吗？

30040016.Original_Text: 내 걱정보다 자네 걱정이나해.\n피가 철철나고 있잖아.
30040016.English_Text:
Worry about yourself before worrying about me.
You're bleeding pretty badly.
30040016.Chinese_Text:
有空担心别人，不如先担心自己吧。
看你出血的样子。

30040017.Chinese_Text:
啊，是饿狼大人！
门主大人！就是这里！

30040019.Chinese_Text: 没想到门主大人会来这里！

30040020.English_Text: <textColor=[78:148:215:255]>Aran</>, I'm so honored to be with you!
30040020.Chinese_Text: 竟然能见到饿狼大人，真是荣幸之至！

30040021.English_Text:
What should we do, <textColor=[78:148:215:255]>sir</>?
Beyond this is a cliff.
30040021.Chinese_Text:
这该怎么办...门主大人？
前面是悬崖。

30040022.Original_Text: 음... 이정도 높이면 가능할 수도 있겠는데?\n다들 괜찮겠지?
30040022.English_Text:
I think this height is doable,
don't you think?
30040022.Chinese_Text:
唔...这种高度应该没问题吧？
大家都可以吧？

30040023.Original_Text: 저, 저 녀석이!! 언제쯤 철이 들는지.\n<textColor=[78:148:215:255]>문주님</>께 도움 되지는 못할망정...!
30040023.English_Text:
H-hey! Will he ever grow up?
He should be helping the <textColor=[78:148:215:255]>master</> out!
30040023.Chinese_Text:
这，这家伙！！到底什么时候才会懂事。
不仅不帮门主大人，竟然还...！

30040024.English_Text: Oh, now isn't the time for this.

30040025.Original_Text: 그, 그러게요. 잠시 시간을 두고 오실까요?
30040025.English_Text: You're right. Should we come back later?
30040025.Chinese_Text: 是，是呀。要不要待会再来呢？

30040026.Original_Text: <textColor=[78:148:215:255]>시국 사형</>은 왜 그렇게 삐뚤어져 버린 걸 까?\n어렸을 때는 정말 착했는데...
30040026.English_Text:
How did <textColor=[78:148:215:255]>Brother Sigook</> end up so twisted?
He was so kind when he was younger...
30040026.Chinese_Text:
时局师兄为什么会走上歪路呢？
小时候明明很善良...

30040027.Original_Text: 아니 저 <textColor=[255:204:102:255]>낡은 삭도</>를 타고 가다니 제정신인가?\n어휴... 사람이 어쩌다 그렇게 된 건지...
30040027.English_Text:
What's he doing, riding that <textColor=[255:204:102:255]>old cableway</>? Is he crazy?
How did he get like this...?
30040027.Chinese_Text:
竟然使用那么陈旧的索道？
唉...人怎么会疯成这样...
